H0.text: What film was the first sequel to win a Best Picture Oscar. The Godfather: Part III

H1.text: What film was the first sequel to win a Best Picture Oscar. Terminator 2: Judgment Day

H2.text: What film was the first sequel to win a Best Picture Oscar. Aliens

H3.text: What film was the first sequel to win a Best Picture Oscar. TGP2

A4.text: It is the only film in the trilogy not to win for Best Picture, or any other Academy Award for that matter.

A5.text: Aliens received two awards at the 1987 Academy Awards: Best Sound Effects Editing (Don Sharpe) and Best Visual Effects (Robert Skotak, Stan Winston, John Richardson, Suzanne Benson).
